005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library.FnNot;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBase64BinaryItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateTimeItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDayTimeDurationItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDurationItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IUntypedAtomicItem;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IYearMonthDurationItem;
024
025import java.util.Locale;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028
029@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.GodClass", "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity" })
030public final class ComparisonFunctions {
031  /**
032   * Comparison operators.
033   */
034  public enum Operator {
035    /**
036     * An equal comparison.
037     */
038    EQ,
039    /**
040     * A not equal comparison.
041     */
042    NE,
043    /**
044     * A less than comparison.
045     */
046    LT,
047    /**
048     * A less than or equal comparison.
049     */
050    LE,
051    /**
052     * A greater than comparison.
053     */
054    GT,
055    /**
056     * A greater than or equal comparison.
057     */
058    GE;
059  }
060
061  private ComparisonFunctions() {
062    // disable construction
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Compare the two items using the provided {@code operator}.
067   *
068   * @param leftItem
069   *          the first item to compare
070   * @param operator
071   *          the comparison operator
072   * @param rightItem
073   *          the second item to compare
074   * @return the result of the comparison
075   */
076  @NonNull
077  public static IBooleanItem valueCompairison(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem leftItem, @NonNull Operator operator,
078      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem rightItem) {
079    return compare(leftItem, operator, rightItem);
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Compare the sets of atomic items.
084   *
085   * @param leftItems
086   *          the first set of items to compare
087   * @param operator
088   *          the comparison operator
089   * @param rightItems
090   *          the second set of items to compare
091   * @return a or an empty {@link ISequence} if either item is {@code null}
092   */
093  @NonNull
094  public static IBooleanItem generalCompairison( // NOPMD - acceptable complexity
095      @NonNull ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> leftItems,
096      @NonNull Operator operator,
097      @NonNull ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> rightItems) {
098
099    IBooleanItem retval = IBooleanItem.FALSE;
100    for (IAnyAtomicItem left : leftItems.getValue()) {
101      assert left != null;
102      for (IAnyAtomicItem right : rightItems.getValue()) {
103        assert right != null;
104        IAnyAtomicItem leftCast;
105        IAnyAtomicItem rightCast;
106        if (left instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem) {
107          if (right instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem) {
108            leftCast = IStringItem.cast(left);
109            rightCast = IStringItem.cast(right);
110          } else {
111            leftCast = applyGeneralComparisonCast(right, left);
112            rightCast = right;
113          }
114        } else if (right instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem) {
115          leftCast = left;
116          rightCast = applyGeneralComparisonCast(left, right);
117        } else {
118          leftCast = left;
119          rightCast = right;
120        }
121
122        assert leftCast != null;
123        IBooleanItem result = compare(leftCast, operator, rightCast);
124        if (IBooleanItem.TRUE.equals(result)) {
125          retval = IBooleanItem.TRUE;
126        }
127      }
128    }
129    return retval;
130  }
131
132  /**
133   * Attempts to cast the provided {@code other} item to the type of the
134   * {@code item}.
135   *
136   * @param item
137   *          the item whose type the other item is to be cast to
138   * @param other
139   *          the item to cast
140   * @return the casted item
141   */
142  @NonNull
143  private static IAnyAtomicItem applyGeneralComparisonCast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item,
144      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem other) {
145    IAnyAtomicItem retval;
146    if (item instanceof INumericItem) {
147      retval = IDecimalItem.cast(other);
148    } else if (item instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem) {
149      retval = IDayTimeDurationItem.cast(other);
150    } else if (item instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem) {
151      retval = IYearMonthDurationItem.cast(other);
152    } else {
153      retval = item.getJavaTypeAdapter().cast(other);
154    }
155    return retval;
156  }
157
158  /**
159   * Compare the {@code right} item with the {@code left} item using the specified
160   * {@code operator}.
161   *
162   * @param left
163   *          the value to compare against
164   * @param operator
165   *          the comparison operator
166   * @param right
167   *          the value to compare with
168   * @return the comparison result
169   */
170  @NonNull
171  public static IBooleanItem compare( // NOPMD - unavoidable
172      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem left,
173      @NonNull Operator operator,
174      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem right) {
175    @NonNull
176    IBooleanItem retval;
177    if (left instanceof IStringItem || right instanceof IStringItem) {
178      retval = stringCompare(IStringItem.cast(left), operator, IStringItem.cast(right));
179    } else if (left instanceof INumericItem && right instanceof INumericItem) {
180      retval = numericCompare((INumericItem) left, operator, (INumericItem) right);
181    } else if (left instanceof IBooleanItem && right instanceof IBooleanItem) {
182      retval = booleanCompare((IBooleanItem) left, operator, (IBooleanItem) right);
183    } else if (left instanceof IDateTimeItem && right instanceof IDateTimeItem) {
184      retval = dateTimeCompare((IDateTimeItem) left, operator, (IDateTimeItem) right);
185    } else if (left instanceof IDateItem && right instanceof IDateItem) {
186      retval = dateCompare((IDateItem) left, operator, (IDateItem) right);
187    } else if (left instanceof IDurationItem && right instanceof IDurationItem) {
188      retval = durationCompare((IDurationItem) left, operator, (IDurationItem) right);
189    } else if (left instanceof IBase64BinaryItem && right instanceof IBase64BinaryItem) {
190      retval = binaryCompare((IBase64BinaryItem) left, operator, (IBase64BinaryItem) right);
191    } else {
192      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
193          null,
194          String.format("invalid types for comparison: %s %s %s", left.getClass().getName(),
195              operator.name().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT), right.getClass().getName()));
196    }
197    return retval;
198  }
199
200  /**
201   * Perform a string-based comparison of the {@code right} item against the
202   * {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
203   *
204   * @param left
205   *          the value to compare against
206   * @param operator
207   *          the comparison operator
208   * @param right
209   *          the value to compare with
210   * @return the comparison result
211   */
212  @NonNull
213  public static IBooleanItem stringCompare(@NonNull IStringItem left, @NonNull Operator operator,
214      @NonNull IStringItem right) {
215    int result = left.compareTo(right);
216    boolean retval;
217    switch (operator) {
218    case EQ:
219      // retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericEqual(left.compare(right),
220      // IIntegerItem.ZERO);
221      retval = result == 0;
222      break;
223    case GE:
224      // retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericGreaterThan(left.compare(right),
225      // IIntegerItem.NEGATIVE_ONE);
226      retval = result >= 0;
227      break;
228    case GT:
229      // retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericGreaterThan(left.compare(right),
230      // IIntegerItem.ZERO);
231      retval = result > 0;
232      break;
233    case LE:
234      // retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericLessThan(left.compare(right),
235      // IIntegerItem.ONE);
236      retval = result <= 0;
237      break;
238    case LT:
239      // retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericLessThan(left.compare(right),
240      // IIntegerItem.ZERO);
241      retval = result < 0;
242      break;
243    case NE:
244      // retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opNumericEqual(left.compare(right),
245      // IIntegerItem.ZERO));
246      retval = result != 0;
247      break;
248    default:
249      throw new IllegalArgumentException(
250          String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name())); // NOPMD
251    }
252    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(retval);
253  }
254
255  /**
256   * Perform a number-based comparison of the {@code right} item against the
257   * {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
258   *
259   * @param left
260   *          the value to compare against
261   * @param operator
262   *          the comparison operator
263   * @param right
264   *          the value to compare with
265   * @return the comparison result
266   */
267  @NonNull
268  public static IBooleanItem numericCompare(@NonNull INumericItem left, @NonNull Operator operator,
269      @NonNull INumericItem right) {
270    IBooleanItem retval;
271    switch (operator) {
272    case EQ:
273      retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericEqual(left, right);
274      break;
275    case GE: {
276      IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opNumericGreaterThan(left, right);
277      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opNumericEqual(left, right);
278      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
279      break;
280    }
281    case GT:
282      retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericGreaterThan(left, right);
283      break;
284    case LE: {
285      IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opNumericLessThan(left, right);
286      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opNumericEqual(left, right);
287      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
288      break;
289    }
290    case LT:
291      retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericLessThan(left, right);
292      break;
293    case NE:
294      retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opNumericEqual(left, right));
295      break;
296    default:
297      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name()));
298    }
299    return retval;
300  }
301
302  /**
303   * Perform a boolean-based comparison of the {@code right} item against the
304   * {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
305   *
306   * @param left
307   *          the value to compare against
308   * @param operator
309   *          the comparison operator
310   * @param right
311   *          the value to compare with
312   * @return the comparison result
313   */
314  @NonNull
315  public static IBooleanItem booleanCompare(@NonNull IBooleanItem left, @NonNull Operator operator,
316      @NonNull IBooleanItem right) {
317    IBooleanItem retval;
318    switch (operator) {
319    case EQ:
320      retval = OperationFunctions.opBooleanEqual(left, right);
321      break;
322    case GE: {
323      IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opBooleanGreaterThan(left, right);
324      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opBooleanEqual(left, right);
325      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
326      break;
327    }
328    case GT:
329      retval = OperationFunctions.opBooleanGreaterThan(left, right);
330      break;
331    case LE: {
332      IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opBooleanLessThan(left, right);
333      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opBooleanEqual(left, right);
334      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
335      break;
336    }
337    case LT:
338      retval = OperationFunctions.opBooleanLessThan(left, right);
339      break;
340    case NE:
341      retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opBooleanEqual(left, right));
342      break;
343    default:
344      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name()));
345    }
346    return retval;
347  }
348
349  /**
350   * Perform a date and time-based comparison of the {@code right} item against
351   * the {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
352   *
353   * @param left
354   *          the value to compare against
355   * @param operator
356   *          the comparison operator
357   * @param right
358   *          the value to compare with
359   * @return the comparison result
360   */
361  @NonNull
362  public static IBooleanItem dateTimeCompare(@NonNull IDateTimeItem left, @NonNull Operator operator,
363      @NonNull IDateTimeItem right) {
364    IBooleanItem retval;
365    switch (operator) {
366    case EQ:
367      retval = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeEqual(left, right);
368      break;
369    case GE: {
370      IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeGreaterThan(left, right);
371      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeEqual(left, right);
372      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
373      break;
374    }
375    case GT:
376      retval = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeGreaterThan(left, right);
377      break;
378    case LE: {
379      IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeLessThan(left, right);
380      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeEqual(left, right);
381      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
382      break;
383    }
384    case LT:
385      retval = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeLessThan(left, right);
386      break;
387    case NE:
388      retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opDateTimeEqual(left, right));
389      break;
390    default:
391      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name()));
392    }
393    return retval;
394  }
395
396  /**
397   * Perform a date-based comparison of the {@code right} item against the
398   * {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
399   *
400   * @param left
401   *          the value to compare against
402   * @param operator
403   *          the comparison operator
404   * @param right
405   *          the value to compare with
406   * @return the comparison result
407   */
408  @NonNull
409  public static IBooleanItem dateCompare(@NonNull IDateItem left, @NonNull Operator operator,
410      @NonNull IDateItem right) {
411    IBooleanItem retval;
412    switch (operator) {
413    case EQ:
414      retval = OperationFunctions.opDateEqual(left, right);
415      break;
416    case GE: {
417      IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opDateGreaterThan(left, right);
418      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDateEqual(left, right);
419      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
420      break;
421    }
422    case GT:
423      retval = OperationFunctions.opDateGreaterThan(left, right);
424      break;
425    case LE: {
426      IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opDateLessThan(left, right);
427      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDateEqual(left, right);
428      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
429      break;
430    }
431    case LT:
432      retval = OperationFunctions.opDateLessThan(left, right);
433      break;
434    case NE:
435      retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opDateEqual(left, right));
436      break;
437    default:
438      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name()));
439    }
440    return retval;
441  }
442
443  /**
444   * Perform a duration-based comparison of the {@code right} item against the
445   * {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
446   *
447   * @param left
448   *          the value to compare against
449   * @param operator
450   *          the comparison operator
451   * @param right
452   *          the value to compare with
453   * @return the comparison result
454   */
455  @NonNull
456  public static IBooleanItem durationCompare( // NOPMD - unavoidable
457      @NonNull IDurationItem left,
458      @NonNull Operator operator,
459      @NonNull IDurationItem right) {
460    IBooleanItem retval = null;
461    switch (operator) {
462    case EQ:
463      retval = OperationFunctions.opDurationEqual(left, right);
464      break;
465    case GE:
466      if (left instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem && right instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem) {
467        IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opYearMonthDurationGreaterThan(
468            (IYearMonthDurationItem) left,
469            (IYearMonthDurationItem) right);
470        IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDurationEqual(left, right);
471        retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
472      } else if (left instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem && right instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem) {
473        IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opDayTimeDurationGreaterThan(
474            (IDayTimeDurationItem) left,
475            (IDayTimeDurationItem) right);
476        IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDurationEqual(left, right);
477        retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
478      }
479      break;
480    case GT:
481      if (left instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem && right instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem) {
482        retval = OperationFunctions.opYearMonthDurationGreaterThan(
483            (IYearMonthDurationItem) left,
484            (IYearMonthDurationItem) right);
485      } else if (left instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem && right instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem) {
486        retval = OperationFunctions.opDayTimeDurationGreaterThan(
487            (IDayTimeDurationItem) left,
488            (IDayTimeDurationItem) right);
489      }
490      break;
491    case LE:
492      if (left instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem && right instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem) {
493        IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opYearMonthDurationLessThan(
494            (IYearMonthDurationItem) left,
495            (IYearMonthDurationItem) right);
496        IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDurationEqual(left, right);
497        retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
498      } else if (left instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem && right instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem) {
499        IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opDayTimeDurationLessThan(
500            (IDayTimeDurationItem) left,
501            (IDayTimeDurationItem) right);
502        IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDurationEqual(left, right);
503        retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
504      }
505      break;
506    case LT:
507      if (left instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem && right instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem) {
508        retval = OperationFunctions.opYearMonthDurationLessThan(
509            (IYearMonthDurationItem) left,
510            (IYearMonthDurationItem) right);
511      } else if (left instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem && right instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem) {
512        retval = OperationFunctions.opDayTimeDurationLessThan(
513            (IDayTimeDurationItem) left,
514            (IDayTimeDurationItem) right);
515      }
516      break;
517    case NE:
518      retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opDurationEqual(left, right));
519      break;
520    default:
521      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name()));
522    }
523
524    if (retval == null) {
525      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
526          null,
527          String.format("The item types '%s' and '%s' are not comparable",
528              left.getClass().getName(),
529              right.getClass().getName()));
530    }
531    return retval;
532  }
533
534  /**
535   * Perform a binary data-based comparison of the {@code right} item against the
536   * {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
537   *
538   * @param left
539   *          the value to compare against
540   * @param operator
541   *          the comparison operator
542   * @param right
543   *          the value to compare with
544   * @return the comparison result
545   */
546  @NonNull
547  public static IBooleanItem binaryCompare(@NonNull IBase64BinaryItem left, @NonNull Operator operator,
548      @NonNull IBase64BinaryItem right) {
549    IBooleanItem retval;
550    switch (operator) {
551    case EQ:
552      retval = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryEqual(left, right);
553      break;
554    case GE: {
555      IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryGreaterThan(left, right);
556      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryEqual(left, right);
557      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
558      break;
559    }
560    case GT:
561      retval = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryGreaterThan(left, right);
562      break;
563    case LE: {
564      IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryLessThan(left, right);
565      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryEqual(left, right);
566      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
567      break;
568    }
569    case LT:
570      retval = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryLessThan(left, right);
571      break;
572    case NE:
573      retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryEqual(left, right));
574      break;
575    default:
576      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name()));
577    }
578    return retval;
579  }
580
581  /**
582   * Compare the {@code right} item with the {@code left} item using the specified
583   * {@code operator}.
584   *
585   * @param left
586   *          the value to compare against
587   * @param right
588   *          the value to compare with
589   * @return the comparison result
590   */
591  @NonNull
592  public static IIntegerItem compareTo(
593      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem left,
594      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem right) {
595    return IIntegerItem.valueOf(left.compareTo(right));
596  }
597}
